publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2529 Stewart Stevenson: Aberdeenshire Sports and Recreation Facilitiesâ€”That the Parliament deplores the inappropriate sense of priorities displayed by Aberdeenshire Liberal Democrat councillors in choosing to donate a six-figure sum to the development of swimming facilities for a city university outwith its own area while their own Mintlaw Academy has none and while Peterhead pool is in urgent need of new investment.
S2M-2529 Aberdeenshire Sports and Recreation Facilities (lodged on 4 March 2005) Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2529 Aberdeenshire Sports and Recreation Facilities (lodged on 4 March 2005) Michael Matheson*
S2M-2529 Aberdeenshire Sports and Recreation Facilities (lodged on 4 March 2005) John Swinburne*
